subject: Lost orders
description_text:
SSN3540
SSN3336

I've been waiting for 2 months for this. It's not coming, yet another of my
orders has been lost. I need a full refund. I've been told it was coming on
December 7. It has not been delivered. Just like what happened last time,
it says it's at a warehouse somewhere but it never arrives.

I am requesting a full refund.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8712 中
